abstract: Herman Cain attracted the support of 27 percent of Texas Republicans in a new poll, with  Mr. Perry winning support from 26 percent -- putting the two in a statistical tie.
snippet: Herman Cain attracted the support of 27 percent of Texas Republicans in a new poll, with  Mr. Perry winning support from 26 percent -- putting the two in a statistical tie.

headline.main: Even in Texas Poll, Perry Isn't Leading
